thread.title: Ground News - Rescue operation of Army's JCO successful in Manipur, kidnapper was picked up from home in the morning
thread.title_full: Ground News - Rescue operation of Army's JCO successful in Manipur, kidnapper was picked up from home in the morning

author: ABP News
title: Ground News - Rescue operation of Army's JCO successful in Manipur, kidnapper was picked up from home in the morning
text:
Summary by ABP News Manipur Abducted JCO Rescued Safely: A JCO rank officer of the Indian Army, who was abducted by anti-social elements from his residence in Thoubal district of Manipur on Friday (8 March), has been rescued safely. According to the report of the news agency PTI, the security forces freed them in the evening. The news agency quoted sources as saying that 'Junior Commissioned Officer' (JCO) has been identified as Konsam Khera Singh. He is a resident… Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right

According to the report of the news agency PTI, the security forces freed them in the evening. The news agency quoted sources as saying that 'Junior Commissioned Officer' (JCO) has been identified as Konsam Khera Singh. He is a resident…
